New Records: India recorded its highest total of the tournament so far with 181/8
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's 28-ball 53 propelled India to its highest total in this campaign
Rashid Khan removed Rishabh Pant in his previous over and Virat Kohli in the ninth over
Gulbadin Naib (17, 21b), Azmatullah Omarzai (26, 20b) and Najibullah Zadran (19, 17b) delayed the inevitable for Afghanistan
Post-Match Reflections: Skipper Rohit Sharma will be pleased with the teamâ€™s performance
A high standard for the rest of the tournament, all of which will be held in the Caribbean, has been set
Miscellaneous Highlights: The move from USA to Barbados was seamless for India
Others: Suryakumar Yadav was awarded the Man of the Match
